# Is Pfizer (PFE) a Good Stock to Buy before Earnings?

Vince CondarcuriFeb 02, 2026, 06:14 PM

Story Highlights

 Drugmaker Pfizer is set to report its Q4 earnings results on February 3 before the market opens.
 Pfizer has a solid track record when it comes to beating earnings, as it has done so in 15 of its last 16 quarters.
 However, attention will likely shift more to drug development updates. [...] ## Is PFE Stock a Buy?

Turning to Wall Street, analysts have a Moderate Buy consensus rating on Pfizer stock based on five Buys, 12 Holds, and zero Sells assigned in the past three months, as indicated by the graphic below. Furthermore, the average Pfizer price target of $28.53 per share implies 7% upside potential. At the same time, TipRanks’ AI analyst has an Outperform rating and a $29 price target.

See more Pfizer analyst ratings
